text: hey guys, standup time! i'm sorry i'm not here today (working from home) but it would be great it you all met quickly and made sure there were no questions for any of the teams
we even clapped when we were done

Hey All. I just found a bug with the facebook login where your facebook id was getting saved as a google id. This will be fixed in a bit. If you see weird things happening with login using facebook or google let me know and I can clean up your account in the database if needed
what do you guys think about a new app icon? The "donut" one from before was all about the Android guidelines, but this could connect better to iOS and their brand overall.
i think it's a great idea. i was actually thinking that our logo on the actual device looked a little out of place next to all the other flat iOS icons
maybe we try this out for now. I uploaded all the sizes to the NAS / Clients / Bezos / Dev / Assets / app_icon
